metadata.title: CVE-2024-7527 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Unexpected marking work at the start of sweeping could have led to ause-after-free. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 129, Firefox ESR <115.14, Firefox ESR < 128.1, Thunderbird < 128.1, and Thunderbird < 115.14.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
